messages.message: A tiny tent that smells of fresh cut wood and smoldering mushrooms.
Only gnomes and tiny creatures could squeeze through these prickle bushes.
An old log covered with slippery moss.

^ Gutter Town 
 < Crimson Grotto  
 > Old Gold Hole.

Old Gold Hole 
 Beware of traps.
A tiny tent that smells of sparkles and star dust.
A rusty gate with no latch or handle.
A tiny tent that smells of stinky gnome feet.
